content.detailedDescription: First of all i want to know what we saw because that thing was not somethingfrom this world.I was born in lusaka,zambia in africa and if you talked aboutufos peaple think you are insane.I have always thought that ufos were marefiction and craziness by peaple who wanted to attract attention.I work for costco wholesale and im a gas station attendant.My job requires me tostay outside and help our members fill up with gas.So on this particular day iwas looking in the southen sky because we were going to have thanderstorms laterthat day and this disk with a shinny silver colorappered in the sky.I tried totell myself that this was a helicopter and i asked the membermy witnesswho wastalking on the cell phone while he was pumping gas to have a look at thisstrange object and he freaked out and dropped his phone and he started to lookfor his digital camera and he was yelling u f o i couldnt believe my self andthe movment that object made was perfect and out of this world and just as itappeared in a flash of a second woosh it was gone.I have tried to convince myself that that was just a .....I dont know what to think it was.I really wouldlike to speak with someone on this because its bothered me to belive i saw aufo.Call me at 816-461-5385
content.summary: I never thought i would believe in ufos

content.detailedDescription: 61804  1030 pm   ranshaw, pai was headed to my car when i noticed two objects to the northwest of me,travelling east, and another object comming from the south of me, travellingnorth crafts 1, 2  3, respectfully.  all three objectscraft were very differentfrom each other.  the first craft from the northwest, travelling east was aboutdouble the size of a normal star, and about 2 to 3 times as bright.  the brightwhite light it gave off never waivered once, staying constant.  it wastravelling east, as i said, at an accelerated speed compared to the other twoobjects.  it appeared as if it had a definate route, but zigged and zagged atcertain intervals.  i guess you could say it sort of hopped to its destination. the other craft that was comming in from the northwest, craft 2 was on craft 1stail, but was a bit behind it.  almost like someone tailing a car, but notwanting to be seen.  craft 2 looked like a domestic craft, and had the standardblinking bluewhitish lights that most airliners, helicopters, etc.. have. craft3 was comming in from the south and heading in a path that would haveintersected craft 1s path.  the only light on craft 3 was a blinking deep redlight that occured every second or so.  compared to the other two craft it movedthe slowest.  craft 3 did get close to the ufo craft 1, but then changed coursesuddenly, and started heading west.  by the time craft 3 had reached rightoverhead of me, the other two craft were gone.  i heard no sounds during thiswhole experiance.  it looked like all three craft were pretty high up there,although i have no guess as to how high exactly.  maybe as high or a bit higherthan your every day jets go.  i observed this whole scenario in the time it tookme to smoke 1 cigarette. roughly 5 minutes.
content.summary: Brightly lit ufo chased by 2 other craft...

content.detailedDescription: Friend i driving n  from oswego to syracuse   summer day 1993very sunny.On rt 481  around phoenix ny  saw glimmer out corner eye   looked over  sawsmall metallic disk spinning slowley over  10 ft farm house. it as spun andslowley moved s turned on side  as  bottom faced me  sun reflected off it.  100ft from rd  10ft over house. it then turned upside downstill spinning moving sbound  it then  stretched and disappeared.  friend did not see.  thought i wasnuts. minute later it reappeared over next houseboth saw this  it performed exact same actions.In the year following the incident  had strange dreams and three sleep paralysisincidents waking from these dreams.One dream was drawn towards cloaked birdman in rainy carbon world nuts
content.summary: Silver disk
Sighting in everett, wa

content.detailedDescription: Witness onei live in washington, d.C. within the no-fly zone.  on friday evening, may 21,2004,  i was watching television in bed.  at approximately 1030 pm, anelectrical storm began to develop.I was beginning to get sleepy and was considering turning the television off andgoing to sleep.  when there were two very rare bursts of static on thetelevision about a minute apart both at 1042, according to my tivo clock,  mydecision to go to sleep was made since i also feared that it might not be safeto leave the television on any longer.  i pressed the record button on my tivoso that i could finish watching the program at another time, very likely made aquick trip to the bathroom though im not sure, took off my glasses im very nearsighted, and got back into bed.I lay down on my left side facing the large panoramic windows in my bedroom. even with my very impaired vision, i immediately became aware of some lightsmoving in the sky in a way id never seen before.  i immediately sat up,retrieved my glasses from the night table, and put them on.  outside my windowand over rock creek park and a large residential building across the street,balls of light were moving rapidly and a bit jerkily in an oval-shapedcounterclockwise pattern.Its difficult to say exactly how many there were, but i believe that fourindividual lights  would be a good estimate.  after watching them for a stunnedminute or two, i got out of bed, and went next door to get my sister.  togetherwe stood at the window and watched this light show for approximately fiveminutes.  towards the end, the lights seemed to simply fade away through theheavy cloud cover until there was only one left.  that light eventually faded aswell.  i did not look at the clock again until after my sister left.  the timewas 1058.Though ive called them balls of light, they werent perfectly spherical.  therewas no hard edge to them, though i do believe there was a brighter intensity atthe center of each.  during the entire event, they kept moving in the samecircular pattern96 very, very rapidly and very, very erratically,  though pinpointing preciselywhere they were is tough, i recall that my sister and i both stooped a bit toget a full view of the show.  i usually have the blinds in my bedroom about 13of the way down.I forgot until the next evenin
content.summary: Balls of light witnessed during electrical storm

content.detailedDescription: On sunday i took a couple of panorama pictures of my boyfriend in front ofstarvation mt.  granite mt while hiking with our dogs to the top of the funkmountain lookout, just north of the town of conconully, washington.  i waslooking west slightly nw while taking the pictures with a cannon a300 digitalcamera.  we did not notice anything until we got home.  the fist picture showssomething in the clouds to his right.  the second photo shows something againstthe mountains to his left.
content.summary: Saucer-shaped object appeared to move across sky

content.detailedDescription: Sur la route du college, vers 730 du matin jai pu voir une boule lumineuse decouleur blanc nacre9 jaunatre, dapparence non materiele. elle devait etre a un peu pres 15m du solen stationnaire sur le cote droit de la route. pendant la dizaine de secondesjai pu obsercer ceci  la couleur autour de la boule me faisait penser a un fluxdelectricite, javais limpression que la couleur blanche  jaunatre bougeaitaleatoirement comme un boule de plasma. un leger brouillard sest immediatementforme9 autour de la boule, partant de la droite jusqua la gauche en epousant laforme de la sphere. a ce moment on pouvais observer a travers le brouillard lalumiere baisser comme un effet de fading et disparaitre laissant derriere ellele brouillard qui sest aussitot dissipe9e en a peu pres 5 secondes
content.summary: Strange illumination

content.detailedDescription: My mom and i just saw something i thought was a sattelite moving from the insideof the big dipper. we had a nice clear sky and were gazing up looking formeteorites. what we saw was a red-ish shimmering point of light moving prettyslowly towards the ne corner of the big dipper but then slowed down and turnedto head e. i think it took off pretty fast because we lost sight of it suddenly.We then saw a very similar object a couple minutes later to the south of usmoving w. it too disapeared rapidly or possibly stopped completely. bizarrestuff.
content.summary: Thats not a satellite

content.detailedDescription: I was at the red sox game with a friend at fenway park sitting near the rightfield foul pole and noticed a slow moving object in the distance over cambridge. the object was silver and moved from right to left.  it did not appear tochange altitude.  as it moved, it brightened randomly ... colors includedsilver, red, and green.  but when it brightened, it was only one of the colors -not a combination.  a woman in front of me had binoculars, so i asked her forthem and looked through, but it was difficult to tell its shape bc i couldntkeep my hands sturdy.  the red and green lights clearly were on the left side ofthe object same side as the sun.  i gave the binoculars to a friend and hethought it looked like a balloon...  i dont know, i didnt buy it.  if it was aballoon and was shimmering in the sun, i would understand seeing silver... but isaw distince red and green colors - and they were independent i.E. notsimultaneous... it was one or the other.  i lost sight of the object as it movedfarther away.  please email me if someone reported a similar story.  thanks
content.summary: Saw shiny object that changed colors

content.detailedDescription: Burlington,lake ontario,walking past vacant feild.It was night,looked like sunwas out.Like sunset on hot day in summer.This was late fall.Ran to see what itwas.Calm and seemed like it lasted forever.Roundish ,oval.Hovered,45 degreestook off.Disappeared.This sighting is documented in a newspaper that wasdedicated to ufo research.I still have it.Just need to find it.I cant rememberwho the researchers were.Have also seen small silver-grayish spheres in variousplaces.
content.summary: Lake ontario and other areas

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my  back patio at eleven-ten, on june the 9th,and i wassmoking, sitting down and just relaxing, looking at the eastern sky since it hadstarted to rain lightly.I live in the eastern suburb of dayton,ohio.I saw a glowing,orange light coming from the southern sky above the clouds.I was facing easterly it was casting a reflection on the overcasting-clouds.As i watched it moving to the north,my sight was blocked by my garage roof, andi then looked to the north, perchance see it again. i then saw two orangefeflections over the clouds from above, flying now, toward the westernhorizon.The glow of eack reflection was baseball-size in my view, but up therehas to have been fairly-large. when i sighted them in the northern sky thelights were side-by-side, like aircraft would fly in formation.This all happened in about fifteen seconds .As fast as it happened,itdisappeared the same.Aircraft is out of the question, in this case.No jets or any aircraft in this area has ever flown that fast.How fast is roughly forty mils in ten to fifteen secondsive lived here for thirty years and i knowwhat flies these skiescall it ball lightning, call it ufos, call it atmospheric conditions,swampgas,aurora borealis,or whatever you want. i cant answer that question. all iknow was that it was there, and i saw it.It means nothing to me if no one believes it,......Thats what i witnessedrobert meadowsthis event took no more than fifteen seconds.I live about a milefrom the corner of wright patterson air force base and the ofjects seemedto go no further than there and did turn from a northerly direction to westerly,after reaching the point of where the air force base is.The most strange thing about the incident was when i sighted the orange glowin the eastern sky it was one object,then when i observed the object in thenorthern sky, after it went out of my view behind my garage roof, it was twoglowing lights. i seen the one light reflection turn abruptly and startmoving westerly with the other glowing ball.
content.summary: One , the two orange objects in night sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on sr30 beginning at trimble rd. i exited atlexington-springmill rd. and had to wait for the light to change. if i had notstopped,i might not have noticed the oval shaped swirling cloud moving slowlyfrom south to north. it was a perfectly clear day with no other clouds in thesky. i determined that the cloud was moving because, as i sat in my car, theclouds position relative to a light pole changed noticeably. i observed the samephenomenon approximately one month later in the vicinity of straub rd. andlexington av. in manfield, ohio.  within a few minutes, the light changed, and iwas in the lane that turned left. .The cloud was moving toward the north. i didnot follow it.
content.summary: Cloud-like oval form moving south to north

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 220am i sighted an unusual glowing obeject traversing th sky athigh speed. i was driving southboud on interstate 75 just north of pontiacmichigan when the sighting occurred.  the object was observed in the western skytraversing north to south at very high speed. its direction of flight  should oftaken it to the northern ohio area. what made this sighing rather  unusual wasthat the object started out looking like a falling star as it passed butproceeded to picck up speed exhibiting no trailing tail or shower but it seemedto morph into a glowing circular cloud like object. as this object  passed by,or through, the clouds they would glow. it all took place in less than  10seconds. it appeared to start high in the sky and fall as if it was going toimpact in some area by the norther ohio bordertoledo. very intersting experiencebecause what i originally thought was a falling star  meteor was probably not.Wonder if there were more observations to confirm this.
content.summary: Michigan sighting bright  glowing object  traversi

content.detailedDescription: Hello, first ill answer your questions and comment below. ive seen two ufos. thefirst one was a true ufo. the other ill mention in closing. i put anon. for my 2friends names but if you need to contact them they will confirm this for whatever it may be worth.Where were you and what were you doing at the time2 friends and i were playing 12 court basketball at night on the university ofdayton campus outdoor courts which are located at the top of a hill where theirradio broadcast tower is. there was another guy playing by himself on one of theother baskets who observed this but we dont know who he is.What made you first notice the objectprobably one of us looking up when one of us took a shot.What did you think the object was when you first noticed it we werent sure atfirst but when it left there was no doubt wed seen a true ufo.Describe your reactions and actions during and after sighting the object. awe.What the hell was that nobody is going to believe usdescribe the object and its actions. circular, almost directly above us,rotating different colored lights. we had no idea when it appeared but when wesaw it, it appeared to be hovering in place. it did a triangle. heres what imean. draw a triangle giving each corner an a, b and c. we saw it at corner afor maybe 10 seconds then in a swift motion watched it move to corner b andhovered there for 5 seconds then swiftly onto corner c and hovered for 5 secondsthen when it headed back towards corner a it was like watching star trek, just abluish white streak of light that id have to call hyperdrive. i mean gone andgone nowhow did you lose sight of the object see above.As for other questions i didnt answer, the date im not sure, like i said nobodywould believe us. i put it down as my junior high school year 30 years ago. iknow rick duff drove us up there in his mothers car and we had been doing thisfor a couple of years. so since 16 is the legal driving age i put him at 18.Latitude, longitude no clueweather a clear summer night about 1000 p.M. to 1200 midnight.Sound we heard nothing.Surface, structure, apparent size. couldnt tell. it was dark outside, we werelooking straight up at its belly, and as high as it was its tough to tell howbig.I was watching the history channel
content.summary: Saw a ufo hovering

content.detailedDescription: I got up alittle after 3 am to go to the bathroom, where the bathroom is, wellthere is a widow there and i am on the second floor of the house...I looked outand theres all these white lights in the trees, im talking about real tall treesover 150 oaks..The lights flash ramdomly, then in the same sequence over andover again.  the lights would move from tree to tree, circle the tree trunks, acouple came to the ground, one when along the rail of my porch on my pool house. the neighbors dog, amber started barking, when she would bark, the lights wouldgo out, a few minutes after she would stop, then the lights would come back.  iwas really curious when i first started watching them, then i got a littlescared...I woke my two sons and they witnessth it...I was probably at least a150 feet from the objects and from there they appeared to be the size of aquarter...My first quess was lightening bugs...But they give off a greenishyellow light...This light was much bigger and a brilliant white..Also a lotbigger than a lightening bug.  i have seen this object before, but not somany...The first time was in january and there were only three, i talked to myneightbor linda across the street about it to see if she had witenessthanything.  anyway, amber the dog, really started going crazy and they moved upto the border of my yard and the davis where the dog was...After watching them,my fear subsided and i wasnt afraid...Which is really like me at all...I thoughtabout that also all the next day...How i could just go to bed and go to sleepwith them still outside exciting the neightbors dog, but i did. is there aninsect out there that behaves this way  has anyone else reported seeing thesethings i have my movie camera ready tonight just in case they come back.
content.summary: Small   lights

content.detailedDescription: Ft. campbell, kentuckyi was at home waiting for son to get back from high school baseball game. i wentoutside and saw a star twinkling through the treetops. i thought it was a starand then a helicopter. curiousity, then breathlessness, disbelief. at firstcould not move. then we went into the house and i told second witness to drawwhat she had seen. i went into another room to do the same. we did not speakafter object disappeared, not until drawings were finished and then not muchafter that. im not sure. the object appeared to be round and it had big greenand red lights on the bottom, about six of them and they rotated in a clockwiseposition. it was totally silent. the sky was overcast that night and i may nothave  been able to see the entire object. what i did see did not appear thatlarge because i could take all the part that i did see just by looking over myhead. it did pass right over the spot we were standing. it was not high in thesky. could have been just a couple of hundred feet above me. the point iseverything i did see was clear as crystal. it kept the same momentum. it seemedto be gliding and just kept on going over our heads til it disappeared in thenight sky.  notation- am not good with directions.2comcast.Net
content.summary: Something in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Myself, my sister and my wife were at charing park in the craig henryneighbourhood of ottawa, ontario, canada. the time was 2352 on june 5th, 2004.We were observing jupiter with our telescope. jupiter was almost exactly duewest of us at the time. at the moment that the object appeared, none of us werelooking through the telescope, all three of us were looking directly at jupiterand the sky around it.The entire event lasted less than 2.5 seconds.Even though we immediately tried to talk through all of the details, later wehad a few discprepancies, which i will detail here.For measurement purposes i will refer to finger-widths and handspans when heldagainst the sky at arms length.The object appeared one finger-width below and a handspan to the left south ofjupiter. we all agreed that the object did not materialize but rather itaccumulated colour quickly. it streaked in going very fast, in a slight downwardarc, started out black invisible and gained a combined colour of redorange andbluegreen very quickly 0.5 seconds. it left no visible contrail. it flashed verybrightly three times during its progress. it seemed to slow down a little bit,and it seemed to angle downward a little more with each flash - though these twoeffects could have been illusory, resultant of the bright flashes. no debriscould be seen breaking off as it flashed. each flash lit up only a small portionof the sparse clouds below it, suggesting that it was a high-altitude object. ifit were at a lower altitude it should have lit a greater area of clouds. it didnot vanish with its last flash. rather, after the third flash it continued alittle bit farther before winking out. in total it travelled a little less thana handspan across the sky, vanishing two finger-widths below and onefinger-width left south of jupiter.I have already checked heavens-above.Com and i know that it was not an iridiumsatellite flare. it didnt do anything to suggest that it was intelligentlycontrolled. it moved much slower than a shooting star.Here are the discrepancies between wheat the three of us remember.1 i remember only redorange colours, they both remember bluegreen as well.2 i think that it was round, but was wearing my glasses very old prescriptionand cant be sure. my wife said that she couldnt make out a shape. my sisterperfect vision said that she saw either a teardrop shape or a reversed chevron.In the end, i think i
content.summary: Object moving north flashed brightly three times

content.detailedDescription: Near bardstown, kentuckyi live on the outskirts of bardstown, ky.I live about one mile from a store tothe west of me. i left at approximately 950p.M. to go get some pepsi and ciggiesfor me and dip for my husband. i got to the end of our driveway and was about tomake a left and saw a strange light formation in front of me. i thought it wasmaybe a motorized hang glider we have many in town or maybe a blimpthe formation of lights was diamond shaped.I turned around very quickly in adriveway and headed to 245 to get a clear view . i stopped at the stop sign andwas freaked out at this thing.I am an ex-military wife and upss hub is about 30miles north so i have heavy air traffic all night long. i am also familiar withall kinds of aircraft and helicopters just from living near army and air forcebases.I took off heading east towards bardstown when the object crossed right infront of the full moon. i locked up my brakes and slid off side of road andjumped out to look at this thing. i was amazed that people just drove on by. themoon was extremely bright and centered on the road. it was black and shaped likea square but with the top not perfectly square, kinda shorter than the bottom.Locally we have a meat company called fishers and it was shaped like their logo.It had a light on either side just like a plane and a light on top and one onbottom.As it started to move out of the moonlight i jumped in the car and tookoff eastbound to the handy mart about 1 mile away. i ran in and hollered comeoutside theres the weirdest thing ive ever seen out here.The female cashier anda guy and an older man came outside and at this point it was moving slowly tothe north and out of the moon light. they said it was the damndest thing theyhad ever sen and the older man said he was going home as it was headed towardshis residence to get a better look. as it was moving away the top and bottomlights looked as if a plane were banked in your face like one wing to the skythe other to the ground if that makes sense. it just kept drifting off and imade a purchase and continued to watch it on the way back home but it was almostgone by the time i got home. i ran in the front door and right out the back tosee if i could see it any more but we live in a depression and are surrounded byvery old tall trees. i do not know the folks who saw this with me and my viewingvantage was different than theirs hence my answers above.
content.summary: Saw black squarish object cross full moon

content.detailedDescription: I was fast asleep when a very beautiful,bright light appeared i felt along thewall forthe blind releaser and i grabbed it,pulled it up,and i saw a dull blackaircraft.
content.summary: The rude awakening

content.detailedDescription: While watching television at approximately 11-1130 pm in november 1999 i heardfaint intermittant noises outside my residence.  the noise sounded similar tothe noise an inflated balloon makes when you stretch the opening tight andrestrict the airflow coming out of itkind of a high pitched squeal. after hearing the sound off and on for 15 or 20minutes i decided to step out to my back deck to investigate and have acigarette.  i lived in south ogden, on the bluff overlooking the town of uintahand hill afb beyond that.  my back yard was heavily forrested all the way downthe bluff. the deck i was standing on was a second story deck, covered with analuminum awning.  after lighting my cigarette, i leaned against the handrailfacing south and heard the sound again.  it was to my right west and soundedrelatively close.  i looked to the right and saw three lights that formed atriangle just above the treetops in a small valley that is just behind myneighbors house.  i then moved to the west side of the deck to get a betterlook.  the lights were partially obscured by the tree branches of the large treenext to the deck, but i had a relatively good view of the object.  at this timei would say the object was approximately 100 ft west of me, and maybe 10 or 20feet higher than myself.  i remember thinking to myself, what is that andrunning through all the different objects it could be in my mind.  nothingconventional fit.  i thought perhaps it was some sort of stealth helicopter,afterall i lived very close to hill afb and could actually see part of the basefrom my deck.  i ruled out the possibility of a helicopter due to the fact thatwhen the object would move forward or back it never tipped forward or back, butalways was perfectly horizontal.  the object was hovering and completely silentexcept for the intemittant sound i described before.  the sound would last forbetween about 5 and 15 seconds at a time,  and the object appeared to bedifficult to control during the time it was making the sound, turning left orright and raising and lowering slightly.  the object moved very slow under allconditions.  after a few minutes of it hovering over the treetops in the valleynext to me and making these sounds from time to time, it rose vertically toabout thirty feet higher than my position, turned clockwise and slowly moved ina southeasterly direction to a position just a few feet away and just above me.It no longer made any sound at all for the rest of the sighting. as itapproached where i was at, i became very frightened and  extinguished mycigarette and went inside the house to turn off the light.
content.summary: Triangle object in south ogden utah

content.detailedDescription: We  saw these same type of objects twice in the  skyfirst on 3 30 04 and second on 5 27 04we were going fishing both timesfirsrt time was right above truck  briht orange yellow light  flashed on thenoffjust in front of it the light same light came on againthis happened repeatedlyno sound above trucksecond incident  was same sort of lightslarge orange yellow lights were rotating around apparent centerlights were very bright then extinguishthere were several of these light displays along a line of maybe 3 milesmy brother remarked he did not believe in ufos but these seemed unworldlyhe kept remaking what were theyafter 5 minutes the lights all extinguished as they were moving to the easttoward safford arizona
content.summary: Orange lights

content.detailedDescription: Northwest tucson and just finished golfsteady light in sky and close and no soundpossibly air ballooncurious at first then grabbed binoculars to observeinbinoculars observed large cylinder bronze colored with amber yellow lights atbottom .They seemed to be suspended.The lights were long and slender with long lines running thru themabove the cylinder was alarge dark object that i could not make outthe object glided for 3 minutes with no sound to the southeast  and blinked outin a neighbor hood
content.summary: Tucson ufo

content.detailedDescription: We were coming home from the grocery store. my husband and my son were taking inthe groceries through the back door of our house. i was following them with afew bags. as i was getting ready to go inside i noticed several lights dancingon this group of clouds. i figured that they were spotlights. but there wereseveral of them and they were moving about this way and that, in circles, instraight lines. i watched them for a while because i wanted to know what theywere. i didnt see a beam of light coming from the ground like you usually seewhen there are spotlights. i called to my husband inside the house. he came outand observed the lights also. then shortly after my son came outside also. meand my son stood there amazed at the dancing lights. my husband continued tobring in the groceries and stopped to watch them once in a while. he wasnt ascurious as we were. every once in a while when we were watching them we wouldsee a flash of lightning off in the distance. at least we think it waslightning. me and my husband were looking off to the east and i saw a flash outof the corner of my eye. later when we went inside my son told me he saw a beamof light flash. he said its color was rainbow. me and my husband didnt see itbut he did. while we were watching the spotlights dance on the clouds somethingelse caught our attention. then it appeared that five or six stars were movingto the west. then a few of them stopped moving and the other few kept moving tothe west. my husband thinks that maybe they just appeared to be moving becauseof the movement of the clouds. but i think they were moving themselves. later iasked him and he isnt sure if they were or not. we stood outside watching themfor what seemed to be about 7 minutes. i was so amazed that i ran inside andcalled my mother on the cordless to tell her about it. i was talking to her onthe phone when the spotlights slowly disappeared. the spotlights disappeared asthe clouds disappeared and moved off to the northeast. i also wanted to say thatthis isnt the first time i have witnessed ufos. when i was a teenager i had aball of light chase me and my boyfriend on a beach in georgia. it came in off ofthe water, it hovered in the air. it had a beam of light that came out of themiddle of it...It looked like a flashlight beam. it scanned from left to right,it acted as if it was searching for something.
content.summary: Dancing white lights

content.detailedDescription: Got out of shower, went to bedroom upstairs in house.  prepared for bed.  turnedoff the light, laid down in bed.  window allowed a little light from the outsidestreet light.  room was mostly darkened though, as normal.  laying in bed,suddenly had a feeling i was not alone, looked to foot of bed, saw a beingstanding there.  felt very scared, didnt appear human... tried to scream andcould not.  could not move. paralyzed.  felt telepathic communication, cant makeanything of it, it was very fast the telepathy. felt it in my mind.  itleftvanished without a trace, no flash of light or anything, no spaceship icould see.  left no marks or scars, etc. everything seemed totally normal.  imsure this was not a dream.  unfortunately i was the only witness.  i dont knowwhat it wanted or why it happened.  i was initially very fearful but later cameto look on it in a positive way.  maybe they just wanted me to know they were infact real.  i really dont know.  it didnt hurt me.  it just immobilized me andcommunicated with me somehow, maybe knowing id try to run and scream if i could. it just made me stay put, be quiet and then left me without harming me.  if youhave any questions please e-mail me.
content.summary: Alien visitor in bedroom

content.detailedDescription: 1. outside smoking a cig one night, the first time i saw it.Also i have seen thesame one about 10 miles away from the first location i see it more than twice aweek from the first location2. staring off to space, thought it was a star, then realised it was moving, itwas moving up, to the sides, up and down  sideways at the same time.3. a star4. i was dumbfounded, somewhat scared, but i felt very calm, excited, told a lotof my friends, and my parents,  4 others have seen it, i didnt care to drag theminto this..Yet5. at first it kind of stayed there, but i could notice it barely moving, thenit started to hover up to the upright, then started doing a lot of weirdmotions, then it starts blinking, then just faces out in an instant.6. it dissapeared.Some nights more than 1 will come out, doing the same things, and one night isaw a larger white light.
content.summary: 2-3 red lights seen almost nightly around 9pm

content.detailedDescription: Working on a roof in welland, while talking to my boss on my cell phone,observed what i thought was some kids balloon. kept watching it come closer andthought, the wind was wrong for this thing to be doing what it was, basicallystayed at the same altitude but moved very jerkily, stopping and going, slueingsideways etc. there was a fairly strong breeze out of the sw, this sphere was ona north to south heading. at first it was hard to judge the size because of theblue sky background, however it disappeared behind a cloud for a few secondsthen reappeared, disappeared behind heavier cloud cover, reappeared for a minuteor so, then i finally lost it behind solid cloud cover. ceiling wasapproximately 2500 ft with scattered cirrus progressing to heavier cloud cover.
content.summary: Observed a dull metallic grey sphere

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were standing in my back yard saying goodbye when he noticeda light fast moving across the night sky.  when we first noticed it we ruled outthat it could not be a plane as it had no flashing lights, we thought perhaps itwas a shuttle or satelite in orbit, however after watching it move across thesky for 3-5 minutes it faded from sight.  my boyfriend noted that it was as ifthe object moved up into space away from earth.
content.summary: Fast moving light vanishes

content.detailedDescription: Driving home on i-96 freeway headed west after dropping kids off at home, hadcamera in the back of truck from daughters field trip, noticed blinkin reda ndgreen and blue far off thought it was a star, pulled off to shoulder jumped inback grabbed camera an started taping and narrating i was amazed by what isawand what it kept showiing me, ive since looked up stars and planets and nonelook familiar it hovered moved up down left to right irradically showed itselfbigger to me lots of time then took of heading nothwest but i could nolongerpick it up with the camera but i could see it leaving still witht the naked eye.
content.summary: Suspected ufo recorded from the side of the freewa

content.detailedDescription: Ohe my i just experienced the weirdest thing ever with no feasable explainationand now i feel all weird and light headed. i will try and explain as best i can.I was sitting inside my house, in my office with the computer and monitor on,and a halogen lamp on. i was waiting to accept a telephone call from a lady whowas supposed to do a telephone interview with me for a job that i recentlyapplied for. about 10 minutes into the interview, my computer started to kindaof fade in and out. it has little green glowing lights on it, the monitor andthe speakers. all of the devices are plugged into the wall through a surgeprotector. anyhow, the monitor started to fade in and out, and the little lightsfaded in and out. i was trying to ignore what was going on so that i couldfinish my interview, but then my cell phone started breaking up and fading inand out. the person with whom i was talking noticed this as well. this went onfor almost a full minute. meanwhile the lamp which is also plugged into thesurge protector also faded in and out and made a really weird noise as it did,kinda of a hum. after the event, and after my interview ended, and probablypoorly at that since i was kind of freaked out about the power issue, i wentaround the house to check on appliances and no clocks needed to be reset oranything, even though the power was weird long enough for my computer to shutdown and have to be rebooted. while the event was happening, i felt a weird kindof field or something come over me as well. i really dont know what to make ofit.  feel free to contact me if needed. i am trying to find out if any one elsein my neighborhood experienced this.
content.summary: Experienced power surge

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 100 am edt on may 24th, i was carrying garbage outside to putin my truck. as i approached my truck, i happened to look up and noticed what ioriginally thought was a shooting star traveling at a high rate of speed to thenorth. i watched it speeding toward the horizon, expecting it to disappear, butinstead when it got to about a 15 degree elevation it made a right angle turntoward the east and continued on until i could no longer see it. i then realizedthat it could not be a shooting star because because of the turn. also, theobject was flashing on and off creating what looked like a hyphenated line oflight moving across the sky. it took only about 1 second to traverse the path ihave described.
content.summary: High speed, flashing ufo observed making a 90 degr
